name: CglMessage
brief:
Message definitions for CGL cut generators

Defines CGL_Message enum codes and CglMessage class for
internationalized message output through CoinMessageHandler.

Message categories:
- Infeasibility detection: CGL_INFEASIBLE, CGL_UNBOUNDED
- Preprocessing results: CGL_FIXED, CGL_MADE_INTEGER, CGL_ADDED_INTEGERS
- Statistics: CGL_PROCESS_STATS, CGL_PROCESS_STATS2
- Clique processing: CGL_CLIQUES, CGL_PROCESS_CLQSTR, CGL_WARNING_CLQSTR
- SOS handling: CGL_PROCESS_SOS1, CGL_PROCESS_SOS2
- Postsolve: CGL_POST_INFEASIBLE, CGL_POST_CHANGED
- Matrix changes: CGL_ELEMENTS_CHANGED1, CGL_ELEMENTS_CHANGED2
see: CoinMessageHandler for the message output system
CoinMessages for base message collection class
